title: MAGNETIC WORK WITH ANDREA DR. PARET'S STUDENT / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS MASTERCLASS
description:
In this video, Dr. Marco Paret's student will demonstrate what he learned in his non-verbal hypnosis Masterclass. He did magnetic passes on a subject, who entered in a wonderful hypnotic state. Dr. Paret says "In every person, there is a light and we must permit to this light to come out!". Non-verbal hypnosis can achieve that! Dr. Paret's new international course is coming, for more information and registration, go to www.marcoparet.com/info 
Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
